flavorText: Some heroes line their coats with yeti fur. More yetis line their bellies with heroes.

foreignData.flavorText: Manche Helden benutzen Yeti-Pelz als Futter für ihre Mäntel. Noch mehr Yetis benutzen Helden als Futter.
foreignData.name: Frostgipfel-Yeti
foreignData.text: {1}{S}: Der Frostgipfel-Yeti kann in diesem Zug nicht geblockt werden. ({S} kann mit einem Mana von einer verschneiten Quelle bezahlt werden.)

foreignData.flavorText: A algunos héroes les gusta hacerse botas con piel de yeti. Pero a los yetis les encanta ponerse las botas a base de héroes.
foreignData.name: Yeti de Picohelado
foreignData.text: {1}{S}: El Yeti de Picohelado no puede ser bloqueado este turno. ({S} puede pagarse con un maná de una fuente nevada.)

foreignData.flavorText: Certains héros bourrent leur manteau avec de la fourrure de yeti. Les yetis, eux, se bourrent la panse avec des héros.
foreignData.name: Yeti de Gèlemont
foreignData.text: {1}{S} : Le Yeti de Gèlemont ne peut pas être bloqué ce tour-ci. ({S} peut être payé avec un mana d'une source neigeuse.)

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni eroi foderano i propri mantelli con pellicce di yeti. Ma sono di più gli yeti che foderano il proprio stomaco con eroi.
foreignData.name: Yeti di Gelopicco
foreignData.text: {1}{S}: Lo Yeti di Gelopicco non può essere bloccato in questo turno. ({S} può essere pagato con un mana da una fonte neve.)

foreignData.flavorText: イエティの毛皮の外套で自尊心を満たす英雄もいるが、英雄で腹を満たすイエティの方がずっと多い。
foreignData.name: 霜峰のイエティ
foreignData.text: {1}{S}：このターン、霜峰のイエティはブロックされない。（{S}は氷雪である発生源からのマナ１点で支払える。）
foreignData.type: 氷雪クリーチャー — イエティ

foreignData.flavorText: 몇몇 영웅들은 자신의 외투에 설인의 모피로 안감을 댄다. 그보다 더 많은 설인들이 자신의 배 속을 영웅들로 장식한다.
foreignData.name: 서리봉우리 설인
foreignData.text: {1}{S}: 서리봉우리 설인은 이 턴에 방어될 수 없다. ({S}는 눈 원천에서 만들어진 마나 한 개로 지불할 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Alguns heróis forram seus casacos com pele de yeti. A maioria dos yetis forra seus estômagos com heróis.
foreignData.name: Yeti do Monte Gélido
foreignData.text: {1}{S}: Yeti do Monte Gélido não pode ser bloqueado neste turno. ({S} pode ser pago com um mana de uma fonte da neve.)

foreignData.flavorText: Некоторые герои украшают свои плащи мехом йети. Куда больше героев заканчивают свою жизнь в брюхе чудовища.
foreignData.name: Йети Морозного Пика
foreignData.text: {1}{S}: Йети Морозного Пика не может быть заблокирован в этом ходу. ({S} можно оплатить одной маной от снежного источника.)

foreignData.flavorText: 有些英雄用雪怪皮毛填充衣物。但更多雪怪用英雄尸体填饱肚子。
foreignData.name: 霜峰雪怪
foreignData.text: {1}{S}：霜峰雪怪本回合不能被阻挡。（{S}能以产自雪境来源的一点法术力来支付。）

foreignData.flavorText: 有些英雄用雪怪皮毛填充衣物。但更多雪怪用英雄屍體填飽肚子。
foreignData.name: 霜峰雪怪
foreignData.text: {1}{S}：霜峰雪怪本回合不能被阻擋。（{S}能以產自雪境來源的一點魔法力來支付。）

name: Frostpeak Yeti
originalText: {1}{S}: Frostpeak Yeti can't be blocked this turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

rulings.text: Activating Frostpeak Yeti’s ability after it’s already been blocked won’t cause it to become unblocked.
Snow is a supertype, not a card type. It has no rules meaning or function by itself, but spells and abilities may refer to it.
The {S} symbol is a generic mana symbol. It represents a cost that can be paid by one mana that was produced by a snow source. That mana can be any color or colorless.
Snow isn’t a type of mana. If an effect says you may spend mana as though it were any type, you can’t pay for {S} using mana that wasn’t produced by a snow source.
Some cards have additional effects for each {S} spent to cast them. You can cast these spells even if you don’t spend any snow mana to cast them; their additional effects simply won’t do anything.

The Kaldheim set doesn’t have any cards with mana costs that include {S}, but some previous sets do. If an effect says such a spell costs {1} less to cast, that reduction doesn’t apply to any {S} costs. This is also true for activated abilities that include {S} in their activation costs and effects that reduce those costs.

text: {1}{S}: Frostpeak Yeti can't be blocked this turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
